title: Clear day in a quiet city intersection with moderate traffic.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly through a city intersection with moderate traffic.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The intersection has a traffic light and a crosswalk. There are two other cars on the road, one of them is parked. The weather is clear and sunny, with no visible pedestrians or obstacles.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because it is approaching a stop sign. It is also maintaining a safe distance from the other cars on the road. The driver is being cautious because of the potential for pedestrians or other obstacles to appear suddenly.
